entry.def: The coverage of something in the news is the reporting of it.

example.ex: Now a special TV network gives live coverage of most races...
example.tran: 现在有一个专门的电视网络对大部分比赛进行现场直播。

example.ex: Most media coverage disapproves of the travellers' lifestyle and values.
example.tran: 大多数媒体报道都不赞成那些旅行者的生活方式和价值观。
